citation.abstract: When two major earthquakes occur within days of each other thousands of kilometres apart, it can look like they're connected. But are they? Here's what the science says.

facebook.title: Are the Japanese and Ecuador earthquakes related?
facebook.summary: Are the earthquakes in Japan + Ecuador related? After all, when two major earthquakes occur within days of each other thousands of kilometres apart, it can look like they're connected. But are they? Here's what the science says.

facebook.title: How earthquakes influence each other is rather complex, particularly over long distances.
facebook.summary: Are the Japanese and Ecuador earthquakes related? Article by Assoc Prof Mark Quigley and Prof Mike Sandiford

facebook.title: Are the Japanese and Ecuador earthquakes related?
facebook.summary: Ecuador and Japan suffered massive earthquakes back to back. When 2 major earthquakes occur within days of each other thousands of miles apart, it can look like they're connected. The Conversation Australia asks: are they in fact related?

news.title: 日本とエクアドルの巨大地震は、環太平洋火山帯の地震活動が活発化している結果かもしれない
news.summary: 熊本県を中心とする九州地方で日本時間14日夜マグニチュード（Ｍ）6.5、16日にM7.3の地震が発生、多数の死傷者と被害をもたらした。続く17日（日本時間）には南米エクアドルでもＭ7.8の地震が発生、19日までに死者は400人を超えた。 太平洋をはさんだ2つの国で相次いで巨大地震が発生したことで、その関連性に注目が集まっている。しかし異なる地域、とりわけ遠隔地で起きた地震が新たな地震の発生にどのように影響を与え得るのかというと、話はかなり複雑だ。 余震 巨大地震は断層がずれることによって引き起こ…
